tool.name: Minfi Get Annotation
tool.description: get annotation for various Illumina methylation objects

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) GRSet <- get(load('$input1'))
annotation <- getAnnotation(GRSet)
write.table(annotation, '$output1')

tool.help:
Tool returns requested annotation as a data frame, with each row corresponding to a methylation loci with information included in following columns:
- chr - pos - strand - Name - AddressA - AddressB - ProbeSeqA - ProbeSeqB - Type - NextBase - Color - Probe_rs - Probe_maf - CpG_rs - CpG_maf - SBE_rs - SBE_maf - Islands_Name - Relation_to_Island - Forward_Sequence - SourceSeq - Random_Loci - Methyl27_Loci - UCSC_RefGene_Name - UCSC_RefGene_Accession - UCSC_RefGene_Group - Phantom - DMR - Enhancer - HMM_Island - Regulatory_Feature_Name - Regulatory_Feature_Group - DHS
